project_preview_description.text: An e-commerce Rails app built for learning Rails through example

project_description.text: A mini e-commerce application built by Lighthouse Labs with Rails 4.2 for purposes of teaching Rails by example. This app covers the full stacks using Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, and Stripe
